org.jasig.cas.services.web

Class RegisteredServiceSimpleFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.services.web.RegisteredServiceSimpleFormController

  • @Controller
public final class RegisteredServiceSimpleFormController
extends Object
    SimpleFormController to handle adding/editing of RegisteredServices.
    Since:
    3.1
    Author:
    Scott Battaglia

      • getCommand

public RegisteredService getCommand(@RequestParam(value="id",required=false)
                                          String id)
